verses.kjv: Now these are the kings of the land, which the children of Israel smote, and possessed their land on the other side Jordan toward the rising of the sun, from the river Arnon unto mount Hermon, and all the plain on the east:
verses.web: Now these are the kings of the land, whom the children of Israel struck, and possessed their land beyond the Jordan toward the sunrise, from the valley of the Arnon to Mount Hermon, and all the Arabah eastward:
verses.ct: Here is the list of kings whose lands the Israelites conquered east of the Jordan River, from the Arnon Valley all the way north to Mount Hermon, including the entire eastern plain:

verses.kjv: Sihon king of the Amorites, who dwelt in Heshbon, and ruled from Aroer, which is upon the bank of the river Arnon, and from the middle of the river, and from half Gilead, even unto the river Jabbok, which is the border of the children of Ammon;
verses.web: Sihon king of the Amorites, who lived in Heshbon, and ruled from Aroer, which is on the edge of the valley of the Arnon, and the middle of the valley, and half Gilead, even to the river Jabbok, the border of the children of Ammon;
verses.ct: First was Sihon, king of the Amorites, who lived in Heshbon. He ruled from Aroer on the edge of the Arnon Valley, including the middle of the valley, through half of Gilead, and up to the Jabbok River, which formed the border with the Ammonites.

verses.kjv: And from the plain to the sea of Chinneroth on the east, and unto the sea of the plain, even the salt sea on the east, the way to Bethjeshimoth; and from the south, under Ashdothpisgah:
verses.web: and the Arabah to the sea of Chinneroth, eastward, and to the sea of the Arabah, even the Salt Sea, eastward, the way to Beth Jeshimoth; and on the south, under the slopes of Pisgah:
verses.ct: He also controlled the eastern plain from the Sea of Chinneroth down to the Salt Sea, along the road to Beth-jeshimoth, and southward below the slopes of Pisgah.

verses.kjv: And the coast of Og king of Bashan, which was of the remnant of the giants, that dwelt at Ashtaroth and at Edrei,
verses.web: and the border of Og king of Bashan, of the remnant of the Rephaim, who lived at Ashtaroth and at Edrei,
verses.ct: Next was Og, king of Bashan, one of the last of the Rephaim giants, who lived in Ashtaroth and Edrei.

verses.kjv: And reigned in mount Hermon, and in Salcah, and in all Bashan, unto the border of the Geshurites and the Maachathites, and half Gilead, the border of Sihon king of Heshbon.
verses.web: and ruled in Mount Hermon, and in Salecah, and in all Bashan, to the border of the Geshurites and the Maacathites, and half Gilead, the border of Sihon king of Heshbon.
verses.ct: Og ruled over Mount Hermon, Salcah, and all of Bashan as far as the territory of the Geshurites and Maachathites, plus half of Gilead down to the border of King Sihon of Heshbon.

verses.kjv: Them did Moses the servant of the LORD and the children of Israel smite: and Moses the servant of the LORD gave it for a possession unto the Reubenites, and the Gadites, and the half tribe of Manasseh.
verses.web: Moses the servant of LORD and the children of Israel struck them. Moses the servant of LORD gave it for a possession to the Reubenites, and the Gadites, and the half-tribe of Manasseh.
verses.ct: Moses, the servant of the LORD, and the Israelites defeated both of these kings. Then Moses gave their land to the tribes of Reuben, Gad, and the half-tribe of Manasseh as their permanent territory.

verses.kjv: And these are the kings of the country which Joshua and the children of Israel smote on this side Jordan on the west, from Baalgad in the valley of Lebanon even unto the mount Halak, that goeth up to Seir; which Joshua gave unto the tribes of Israel for a possession according to their divisions;
verses.web: These are the kings of the land whom Joshua and the children of Israel struck beyond the Jordan westward, from Baal Gad in the valley of Lebanon even to Mount Halak, that goes up to Seir. Joshua gave it to the tribes of Israel for a possession according to their divisions;
verses.ct: Here is the list of kings west of the Jordan whom Joshua and the Israelites defeated, from Baal-gad in the valley of Lebanon all the way south to Mount Halak near Seir. Joshua gave this land to the tribes of Israel, dividing it among them as their inheritance.

verses.kjv: In the mountains, and in the valleys, and in the plains, and in the springs, and in the wilderness, and in the south country; the Hittites, the Amorites, and the Canaanites, the Perizzites, the Hivites, and the Jebusites:
verses.web: in the hill country, and in the lowland, and in the Arabah, and in the slopes, and in the wilderness, and in the South; the Hittite, the Amorite, and the Canaanite, the Perizzite, the Hivite, and the Jebusite:
verses.ct: This territory included the hill country, the lowlands, the plains, the mountain slopes, the wilderness, and the southern desert — lands that had belonged to the Hittites, Amorites, Canaanites, Perizzites, Hivites, and Jebusites:

verses.kjv: The king of Jericho, one; the king of Ai, which is beside Bethel, one;
verses.web: the king of Jericho, one; the king of Ai, which is beside Bethel, one;
verses.ct: The king of Jericho — one. The king of Ai, near Bethel — one.

verses.kjv: The king of Jerusalem, one; the king of Hebron, one;
verses.web: the king of Jerusalem, one; the king of Hebron, one;
verses.ct: The king of Jerusalem — one. The king of Hebron — one.

verses.kjv: The king of Jarmuth, one; the king of Lachish, one;
verses.web: the king of Jarmuth, one; the king of Lachish, one;
verses.ct: The king of Jarmuth — one. The king of Lachish — one.

verses.kjv: The king of Eglon, one; the king of Gezer, one;
verses.web: the king of Eglon, one; the king of Gezer, one;
verses.ct: The king of Eglon — one. The king of Gezer — one.

verses.kjv: The king of Debir, one; the king of Geder, one;
verses.web: the king of Debir, one; the king of Geder, one;
verses.ct: The king of Debir — one. The king of Geder — one.

verses.kjv: The king of Hormah, one; the king of Arad, one;
verses.web: the king of Hormah, one; the king of Arad, one;
verses.ct: The king of Hormah — one. The king of Arad — one.

verses.kjv: The king of Libnah, one; the king of Adullam, one;
verses.web: the king of Libnah, one; the king of Adullam, one;
verses.ct: The king of Libnah — one. The king of Adullam — one.

verses.kjv: The king of Makkedah, one; the king of Bethel, one;
verses.web: the king of Makkedah, one; the king of Bethel, one;
verses.ct: The king of Makkedah — one. The king of Bethel — one.

verses.kjv: The king of Tappuah, one; the king of Hepher, one;
verses.web: the king of Tappuah, one; the king of Hepher, one;
verses.ct: The king of Tappuah — one. The king of Hepher — one.

verses.kjv: The king of Aphek, one; the king of Lasharon, one;
verses.web: the king of Aphek, one; the king of Lassharon, one;
verses.ct: The king of Aphek — one. The king of Lasharon — one.

verses.kjv: The king of Madon, one; the king of Hazor, one;
verses.web: the king of Madon, one; the king of Hazor, one;
verses.ct: The king of Madon — one. The king of Hazor — one.

verses.kjv: The king of Shimronmeron, one; the king of Achshaph, one;
verses.web: the king of Shimron Meron, one; the king of Achshaph, one;
verses.ct: The king of Shimron-meron — one. The king of Achshaph — one.

verses.kjv: The king of Taanach, one; the king of Megiddo, one;
verses.web: the king of Taanach, one; the king of Megiddo, one;
verses.ct: The king of Taanach — one. The king of Megiddo — one.

verses.kjv: The king of Kedesh, one; the king of Jokneam of Carmel, one;
verses.web: the king of Kedesh, one; the king of Jokneam in Carmel, one;
verses.ct: The king of Kedesh — one. The king of Jokneam in Carmel — one.

verses.kjv: The king of Dor in the coast of Dor, one; the king of the nations of Gilgal, one;
verses.web: the king of Dor in the height of Dor, one; the king of Goiim in Gilgal, one;
verses.ct: The king of Dor in the coastal region of Dor — one. The king of the nations in Gilgal — one.

verses.kjv: The king of Tirzah, one: all the kings thirty and one.
verses.web: the king of Tirzah, one: all the kings thirty-one.
verses.ct: The king of Tirzah — one. That makes 31 kings in all.
